skins.selfIntroduction: I guess you could say that I was the first aircraft carrier ever in the world. You could call me the eldest sister, or mother, of them all! Feel free to consult with me whenever you'd like, Commander. I'm always here for you.
skins.acquisition: Ah, it's the Commander... My name is Houshou, and I'll be in your care from now on. Please leave the children of the fleet in my care. I won't let you down!
skins.login: Commander, have you eaten yet? No? Let me make something for you. You can't head to work without first preparing your body and mind!
skins.details: You're like a kid sometimes, Commander... Come over here~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Having long legs isn't necessarily a good thing. A high center of mass makes it easy to tip over...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I prepared some snacks for us. Do you want to relax for a while?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's amazing to see how much my younger sisters have accomplished, but sometimes it makes me a bit sad to see everything they've gone through...
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you looking for me, Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahh! ... Commander, that's naughty. You can't touch me there.

skins.ENClientName: The Dream of the Autumn Pillow
skins.shipDescription: While everyone slips into sweet dreams from the night's festivities, the sound of gossamer sliding off of smooth skin reaches your ears... Hehe, would you like to spend this night under the stars with me, Master~?
skins.acquisition: While everyone slips into sweet dreams from the night's festivities, the sound of gossamer sliding off of smooth skin reaches your ears... Hehe, would you like to spend this night under the stars with me, Master~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: At least for tonight, I wish you and I to pursue the happiness of being together...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Master, what do you think of your Tanabata present? Are~ you~ satisfied~?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe... Master, if your heart races, then it's my victory~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: The ephemeral autumn is but a fleeting dream
